Comment.Language: For the Paramoun of the Theophany:

Text.Language: Ounis] m~muct/rion: e~tafouonhf nak e~bol: w~ Iwann/c pip~rodromoc: p~s/ri n~Za,ariac.
A great mystery, was revealed to you, O John the Forerunner, the Son of Zacharias.
سر عظيم الذي أعلنه لك يا يوحنا السابق إبن زكريا.
Rwf m~V] afermeyre: qarok w~ piref]wmc: je m~mon v/ettenywnt e~rok: qen nimici n~te nihio~mi.
The mouth of God witnessed, to you O Baptizer, “No one is like you, among those born of women.”
فم الله شهد لك أيها المعمدان لأنه ليس مَن يشبهك في مواليد النساء.
Nyok pe p~jwk n~nip~rov/t/c: e~taui~ qajwf m~Pencwt/r: akcob] n~nefmam~mosi: kata p~caji n~Ica/~ac.
You are the culmination of the prophets, who came before our Savior, you prepared His paths, as said by Isaiah.
أنت هو كمال الأنبياء الذين جاءوا قبل مخلصنا لتعدّ طرقه كقول أشعياء.
Nak hiwis ekjw m~moc: je a~nok men ]wmc m~mwten: qen oumwou m~metanoia~: e~p~,w e~bol n~te ninobi.
You preached saying, “I baptize you with water, with the waters of repentance, for the forgiveness of sin.”
وكنت تكرز قائلا أما أنا فأعمدكم بماء التوبة لمغفرة الخطايا.
Pete ouon taf s~y/n 2: efe~] m~pete m~mon n~taf: ouoh pete ouon taf n~ouwik: marefi~ri on m~pair/].
He who has two cloaks, let him give to him who has none, and he who has bread, let him do the same.
مَن له ثوبان فليعط من ليس له والذي عنده خبز فليصنع هكذا أيضاً.
Eybe vai tener,wreuin: enws e~bol nem pip~rov/t/c: je eue~nau n~je carx niben: e~picwt/r n~te V].
Therefore we praise, proclaiming with the prophet, saying all flesh will see, the salvation of God.
لهذا نمدح صارخين مع النبي قائلين أن كل جسد ينظر خلاص الله.
Marenouwst m~pencwt/r: pimairwmi n~a~gayoc: je n~yof afsenh/t qaron: afi~ ouoh afcw] m~mon.
Let us worship our Savior, the Good Lover of Mankind, for he had compassion upon us, He came and saved us.
فلنسجد لمخلصنا الصالح محب البشر لأنه تراءف علينا أتى وخلصنا.
Tenhwc e~rof ten]wou naf: tenerhouo~ [ici m~mof: hwc agayoc ouoh m~mairwmi: nai nan kata peknis] n~nai.
We praise and glorify Him, and exalt Him above all, as the Good One and Lover of Mankind, have mercy upon us according to Your great mercy.
نسبحه ونمجده ونزيده رفعة كصالح ومحب البشر إرحمنا كعظيم رحمتك.
